name: Richterm's Retreat - Land of Nordock (RP server)
author: Chewy23

posts.author: Chewy23
posts.content:
Nordock is a land falling under a shadow. Dark forces struggle with the light, seeking to overcome all that is good and just. Come in and adventure... Slay the forces of evil. Be an evil Drow yourself and fight against the light. 

More info -
http://nordock.net/status/server/0

You can find forums on website as well as up to date status for each server.

Classic (1-20) - 72.54.15.61:5122

Epic (1-40) - 72.54.15.61:5121 (most active/popluated)

Difficult (1-40) - 72.54.15.61:5124 (same module but harder)

Come join us for daily adventures full of roleplay and fun!
Not many changes to classes or spells so a good place to bring your builds to life with plenty of challenging areas and many friendly players.

-Chewy

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Any chance we get more information about this PW Chewy?

Is it low or high magic? Is it rp-oriented or hack & slash? Is devastating critical allowed or banned? Are there any alignment shifts or not?

Things like that ;)

posts.author: Chewy23
posts.content:
Alot of magic casting encounters with a variety of high level combinations to change things up 
Very RP oriented
Dev crit is allowed
Alignment shifts? Killing certain NPCs does change alignment and can also be achieved through role play

We have a small but very active community of players and would love to add to that. Always a group to party with as most consistent players have characters of all level ranges.

posts.author: Cornflower
posts.content: I can't find this, so I guess it's not online anymore?

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
I believe it - or at least versions of it are - still up and running. If you check out Kid Miracleman's recent posts in the Build Request forum there's a link in at least one of them.

Cheers
